author: Shawnjohn
title: Great showpiece!
review:
Excellent build and more than excellent showpiece.  The only area that this set lacks, is in playability.  It is VERY fragile and I actually kept breaking parts of it while moving it when finished to it's final show location.

 The minifgure selection is also great as it gives you a bunch of new figs and some excellent detail with all of them, including the sharks.  Also returning is Jack sparrow in an all new torso.  The size of the set is also of great value as it's ~$250 and well worth it.

  If you're an adult fan, you will love this set.

author: jjackson7608
title: Loose pieces
review: The ship is a nice looking piece. The only complaint I have is that the sides fall off very easily when trying to move to clean around it. I think that the side pieces are to heavy for the one and two hanger pieces that hold them in place.
